mapper.select: SELECT menu_no as menuNo, menu_status as menuStatus, soft_delete as softDelete FROM menu WHERE menu_no = #{menuNo}

SELECT m.menu_no As menuNo, c.name AS categoryName, m.menu_name as menuName, m.menu_price as menuPrice, m.description as menuDescription FROM menu m inner join categories c on c.categories_no = m.categories_no where m.menu_no = #{menuNo} and m.soft_delete = 'N'

SELECT m.menu_no, c.name AS category_name, m.menu_name, m.menu_price, m.menu_Status FROM menu m inner join categories c on c.categories_no = m.categories_no where m.categories_no = #{categoriesNo} and c.store_no = #{storeNo} and m.soft_delete = 'N' ORDER BY m.menu_status asc, m.position asc
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU set menu_status = CASE WHEN menu_status = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WHERE menu_no = #{menuNo} and soft_delete = 'N'
